quotes.quote: Positive mind always consider and realize that even failure is a part of success.
There is way to turn negative thinking to positive thinking, it means seeing the positives and not focusing on the negatives.
Never say anything about yourself that you do not want to come true.
The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
Focus on your potential instead of your limitations.
If you have a positive outlook in life, you will attract positive and passionate people.
Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
Positive thinking is the key which unlocks the doors of the world.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
Positive thinking must be followed by positive doing.
There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle, or the mirror that reflects it.
Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.
Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.
Positive thinking is the notion that if you think good thoughts, things will work out well. Optimism is the feeling of thinking things will be well and be hopeful.
Keep in mind that you need to stop comparing yourself with others. Don't seek validation by looking how well others are doing.
Keep your spirits up. Good things will come to you and you will come to good things.
The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible and achieves the impossible.
Your circumstances may be uncongenial, but they shall not remain so if you only perceive an ideal and strive to reach it. You cannot travel within and stand still without.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
When you think and say I can, confidence and happiness will fill your entire being.
Don't hang with negative people. They will pull you down with them. Instead, invite them into your light and together you will both shine strong.
Don't promote negativity online and expect people to treat you with positivity in person.
Don't be the slave of a negative character. Be the master of a positive character.
Positive thinking helps you stand back up again when you are knocked down by bad luck or negativity.
Think positively and masterfully, with confidence and faith, and life become more secure, more fraught with action, richer in experience and achievement.
Positive thinking creates ingenuity and originality. Negative thinking cripples imagination and creativity.
If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
When you consistently maintain a positive frame of mind, you'll become known as a problem solver rather than a complainer. People avoid complainers. They seek out problem solvers.
